text: smoothies are one of my favorite ways to
get so many nutritious ingredients into
one glass and for breakfast this
blueberry almond butter smoothie has
flax seeds this is something I'm always
trying to incorporate into my diet so to
start I'm gonna peel one ripe banana
make sure you have a really nice break

to our smoothie just break it up for
sweetness I'm gonna add three dates
these are just pitted medjool dates
tablespoon of fresh lemon juice this is

three tablespoons of almond butter the

the morning now I'm gonna add one and a
half cups of blueberries I'm using
frozen blueberries here and this is a

if you're using fresh in the middle of

for nice consistency now final touch two
tablespoons of whole flax seeds I like
to start with cold flax seeds and then
grind them either in a food processor or
in a blender with the smoothie that's
how you're able to absorb all the

especially omega threes now the main
ingredient I have two cups of water if
you're trying to stay away from dairy
this is a wonderful smoothie okay we'll

okay this looks great so I think a lot
